AUTHOR: watersnake
SHORT: Gathers information on when users interact with each other, for use in later analysis.
DESCRIPTION: Gathers information on when users interact with each other. Code for analyzing collected data can be found here: https://github.com/samclane/DiscordSocialGraph
NAME: member_logger
INSTALL_MSG: Requires package "pandas" be installed in Python. Default save location is /data/member_logger/data.csv. Run `[p]update_namemap` to generate `names.csv`. If you want to register a database to INSERT data, run `[p]set_database_url <URL>`. Updates will be pushed every 30 minutes. Databases requires package `sqlalchemy` as well as the relevant Python Driver. Check out https://github.com/samclane/DiscordSocialGraph for data analysis tools.
